title: 25% off @ Fonts.com, 1 day only
content: Save 25% off any online purchase from Fonts.com, now through midnight, March 11, 2010 (PST). Simply enter the coupon code YDZLU in your shopping cart.
author: Renaissance Man

comments.content:
\> 25% off any online purchase from Fonts.com,

With all due respect: who cares? They have money to burn on their advertising/marketing (if not -- they have the News/Release section)
I still have copies of old U&L magazines. Online version is still working.

<cite> “Fonts.com Secret Sale - 25% Off Entire Order”</cite>

<cite>“We’re rewarding those most loyal to us with a special promotion only available to Fonts.com newsletter subscribers.”</cite>

Hah! So much for that.

But they probably won’t mind as long as they get to build their mailing list out of the deal.
